system.description:
Effect: If the target is possesses a [Shield] effect, the effect is removed before Raging Bull deals damage. Raging Bull's damage Type depends on the user's form.
Kantonian Tauros - Normal
Paldean Tauros - Fighting
Blaze Tauros - Fire
Aqua Tauros - Water
